mapper.select: SELECT R1.*,S1.REAL_NAME,P1.REMARK AS TASK_REMARK FROM report_week_details R1 JOIN report_week R2 ON R2.DELETED = 0 AND R1.REPORT_ID = R2.ID AND R2.WEEK_INDEX = #{weekIndex} JOIN SYS_USER S1 ON R2.USER_ID = S1.ID LEFT JOIN project_task_process P1 ON R1.TASK_ID = P1.TASK_ID AND P1.USER_ID = R2.USER_ID ORDER BY S1.REAL_NAME ASC

SELECT P1.TASK_ID,P3.NAME AS PROJECT_NAME,P2.NAME AS TASK_NAME, S1.REAL_NAME AS USER_REAL_NAME, P1.BEGIN_TIME,P1.END_TIME,P1.REAL_END_TIME,IFNULL(P1.WORK_HOUR,0) AS WORK_HOUR,DATE_FORMAT(P1.BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS DAY FROM project_task_process_details P1 JOIN project_task P2 ON P1.TASK_ID = P2.ID JOIN PROJECT_INFO P3 ON P2.PROJECT_ID = P3.ID JOIN SYS_USER S1 ON P1.USER_ID = S1.ID AND P1.BEGIN_TIME >= #{beginTime} AND (P1.END_TIME <= #{endTime} OR P1.END_TIME IS NULL) ORDER BY USER_ID,BEGIN_TIME ASC
